courses.title: Business English for Everyday Use (Module 2)
courses.description:
1. Use the appropriate adjectives to describe marketing activities. 
2. Describe a situation’s possible outcomes using the first and second conditionals. 
3. Make logical connections using the correct expressions. 
4. Converse competently with a potential customer about the product you are selling. 
5. Write to a potential customer to follow up on a possible sale. 
*All meals will be provided.
**Dates might change due to an insufficient number of participants, so kindly check the portal or your email for updates.
